general_requirements.statewide_program_name: State-level permitting through Division of Fire Safety electrical board. Some cities like Burlington have own inspectors. Certificate of Public Good (CPG) required from Public Utility Commission.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available for systems up to 500 kW. Green Mountain Power primary utility.

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: Vermont supports solar access through CPG process.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind loads. Design wind speeds 85-100 mph.

licensing.license_type: Vermont licensed electrician required. Burlington has own inspection requirements.

notes: Strong renewable energy support. State-level permitting simplifies process. CPG required from Public Utility Commission. Burlington has separate local inspectors.
